message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm starting the negotiation at $1,000,000. What do you think?

Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the price of $1,000,000. I am willing to pay up to $850,000 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While your offer is reasonable, the product's value is truly significant. How about we settle at $925,000?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I must stick to my budget. I am willing to pay $900,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
